related_questions.question: How do I write a good travel review?
related_questions.snippet: How to write a review about a hotel, tour or trip you've takenSummarise your experience. First and foremost, make sure your review is a good summary of your experience – around 300 words. ... Give the main points. ... Share a helpful tip. ... Comment on the service and facilities. ... Use correct grammar. ... Avoid personal attacks or rants. ... Write it quickly. ... Add photos.20 jun. 2016
